personalInfo.name: Jonathan Pohlner
personalInfo.title: Full Stack Developer | C# • React • TypeScript • 3D Modeling

summary: Software developer with 2.5 years of production C# experience building Revit automation plugins and 4+ years developing web applications in React and React Native. Background in 3D modeling (Blender, 3D Studio Max, SketchUp) and CAD (AutoCAD, Revit) informs approach to translating design workflows into technical solutions. Developed plugins used daily by 12+ drafters, reducing dimensioning tasks from minutes to milliseconds. Maintains 166+ GitHub repositories including full stack templates with 93 components and 680+ tests. Seeking full stack or automation-focused roles where I can build tools that solve real workflow problems for development teams.

experience.title: FULL STACK SOFTWARE DEVELOPER
responsibilities: Built Next.js starter template with 35+ features, 93 Storybook components, and 680+ tests
Containerized development environments using Docker across 166+ GitHub repositories
Built WCAG-compliant Next.js template with PWA support, 32 themes, and colorblind accessibility modes

experience.title: PEER MENTOR
responsibilities: Guide students through React and TypeScript projects, providing code review and debugging support
Participate in weekly community learning sessions and help explain best practices for web development

experience.title: SOFTWARE ENGINEERING INTERN
responsibilities: Built 50+ responsive UI components in React and TypeScript for client web applications
Integrated RESTful APIs and participated in weekly code reviews following agile methodology

experience.title: SOFTWARE DEVELOPER
responsibilities: Built 5+ C# Revit plugins automating wall dimensioning, reducing manual tasks to milliseconds
Deployed automation tools used daily by 12+ drafters, translating design pain points into solutions
Wrote 20+ automated test cases validating plugin functionality across multiple Revit versions
Collaborated with drafting team to identify workflow bottlenecks and prioritize feature development
